Room.Name: West Balcony
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Palace Balcony overlooking the island of Eeste.
Room.LongDescription: The view of Eeste Island is spectacular from this vantage point. You can see majestic mountains rising up from the lake and the small paths and caves that make the island so unique. The balcony is a good place to relax without having to worry about people bothering you.
